document_data.Wells of Darkness:
''By [[Eric L. Boyd]], illustrated by [[Ben Wootten]] & [[Warren Mahy]], Cartography by [[Robert Lazzaretti]].'' '''p. 54-84''' {{Dusup|148/Wells of Darkness}}

The Prince of [[demon]]s hides a secret, one that could be the key to stopping the savage tide. But the only one who knows it is imprisoned on one of the most notorious realms in the [[Abyss]].
